price: Dedi ki: "Orada yaşayacak, orada ölecek ve tekrar oradan diriltilip çıkarılacaksınız."
arabic: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحۡيَوۡنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنۡهَا تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla fīhā taḥyawna wafīhā tamūtūna wamin'hā tukh'rajūna
